weighted
```{r}
w0 = sum(train_X$case==0)/length(train_X$case)
w1 = 1
```


train model
```{r}
library(randomForest)

sample_n=as.numeric(table(train_X$case)[2]*0.8)
sample_n

set.seed(1024)
#for (i in 1:nrow(result)) {
  
rf1<- randomForest(formula = case ~ ., data = train_X, 
                           replace =TRUE,
                           sampsize=c(sample_n,sample_n),
                           strata=train_X$case,
                           ntree =  1000,
                           classwt=c("0"==w0,"1"==w1),
                           nodesize = 100 ,
                           mtry = 3
                          )

varImpPlot(rf1)
```



```{r}

set.seed(1024)
pred.y <- predict(rf1, type = 'prob')[,2]
summary(pred.y)

```




```{r}

set.seed(1024)
pred.y <- predict(rf1, train_X, type = 'prob')[,2]
summary(pred.y)

```



```{r}

set.seed(1024)
pred.y <- predict(rf1,valid_X, type = 'prob')[,2]
summary(pred.y)

```


```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
prob0=train_X%>% filter(pred.y==0)
prop.table(table(prob0$case))

prob1=train_X%>% filter(pred.y==1)
prop.table(table(prob1$case))
```
